cs.CR, cs.SI, cs.NI, cs.SD, cs.AI. 

The paper deals with botnet detection, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The proposed method involves analyzing social relationships among nodes, which suggests the use of social network analysis techniques (cs.SI). The method also involves analyzing communication patterns among nodes, which is related to network security (cs.NI). The paper also mentions the use of a refined modularity measure, which is a common technique in community detection (cs.SD). Finally, the paper proposes a novel botnet detection method that uses large deviations results, which suggests the use of statistical and machine learning techniques (cs.AI).
